ðŸ“– Summary: Upscale-A-Video is a diffusion-based model designed for video super-resolution. It takes low-resolution videos and optional text prompts as input to generate high-resolution, temporally consistent videos. The model is suitable for enhancing real-world videos and AIGC content.
